text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?
text.Response A: To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.
text.Response B: Additionally, it would be best to include sources and citations to support your answer.

meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

247.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?

Response A

To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.

Response B

Additionally, it would be best to include sources and citations to support your answer.
